name: Crafting Rider | Free Motorcycle Racing Game vs Police Cars
name_original: Crafting Rider | Free Motorcycle Racing Game vs Police Cars
description:
Win the race with your mine motorcycle against the police in this exciting game!
Help our runner motorist to escape the police cars through the streets of the city.

You're a motorbiker of illegal speed races. After participating in a night race through the city, the cops are chasing you to stop you, but you're faster than them!
Do not let them reach, run as fast as you can to avoid them.
Be careful, more and more police cars come so the game becomes more difficult and you have to drive at full speed.

Swipe to the right and left of the screen of your mobile phone to steer the bike sideways while avoiding obstacles.
Get all the points you can to beat the high score of your friends.

This game is funny and children can play with total peace of mind for parents.

Download now the best motorcycle racing game against the police and drive as if you were a real motorbiker!
Win the race with your mine pixel motorcycle and achieve the highest score.
